reporter_caption.center: MORAN v. KAISER ALUMINUM CHEMICAL CORPORATION, 117 R.I. 959 (1976)

caption.center: STEVEN MORAN v. KAISER ALUMINUM CHEMICAL CORPORATION.

opinion.posture: Case is consolidated with the cases of Maisano v.Kaiser, 117 R.I. 959, 368 A.2d 1252 (1976), and Walker v. Kaiser,117 R.I. 959, 368 A.2d 1236 (1976), and assigned especially to the calendar for February 7, 1977 for oral argument.
opinion.attorneys:
Lovett Linder, Ltd., Raul L. Lovett, for petitioner.
Ambrose W. Carroll, for respondent.
